text: Hecistopteris pinnatifida is a fern species in the Vittarioideae subfamily of the Pteridaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Pteridaceae Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hecistopteris pinnatifida
